author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Otsuka's tolvaptan approved by U.S. FDA as first treatment to slow kidney function decline in adults at risk of rapidly progressing ADPKD
text:
April 25 (Reuters) - Otsuka Holdings Co Ltd
* Says its unit Otsuka Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. (Otsuka) announces that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has approved JYNARQUEâ„¢ (tolvaptan) as the first drug treatment available to slow kidney function decline in adults at risk of rapidly progressing autosomal dominant polycystic kidney disease (ADPKD)
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/7tfVkk
